verses.verse: Whosoever <S%G3956><s%> believeth <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is born <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> God: <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> every one <S%G3956><s%> that loveth <S%G25><s%> him that begat <S%G1080><s%> loveth <S%G25><s%> him also that is begotten <S%G1080><s%> <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

By <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> we know <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we love <S%G25><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> we love <S%G25><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> keep <S%G5083><s%> his <S%G848><s%> commandments. <S%G1785><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> love <S%G26><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we keep <S%G5083><s%> his <S%G848><s%> commandments: <S%G1785><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G848><s%> commandments <S%G1785><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> grievous. <S%G926><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> whatsoever <S%G3956><s%> is born <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> overcometh <S%G3528><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world: <S%G2889><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> victory <S%G3529><s%> that overcometh <S%G3528><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> even our <S%G2257><s%> faith. <S%G4102><s%>

Who <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> he that overcometh <S%G3528><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> he that believeth <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> he that came <S%G2064><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blood, <S%G129><s%> even Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> but <S%G235><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blood. <S%G129><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> that beareth witness, <S%G3140><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> truth. <S%G225><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> that bear record <S%G3140><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost: <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> one. <S%G1520><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> that bear witness <S%G3140><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> earth, <S%G1093><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> water, <S%G5204><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> blood: <S%G129><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> these three <S%G5140><s%> agree <S%G1526><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> one. <S%G1520><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> we receive <S%G2983><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> greater: <S%G3187><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he hath testified <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G848><s%> Son. <S%G5207><s%>

He that believeth <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> himself: <S%G1438><s%> he that believeth <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath made <S%G4160><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a liar; <S%G5583><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he believeth <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> record <S%G3141><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G848><s%> Son. <S%G5207><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> record, <S%G3141><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath given <S%G1325><s%> to us <S%G2254><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G848><s%> Son. <S%G5207><s%>

He that hath <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> life: <S%G2222><s%> and he that hath <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

These things <S%G5023><s%> have I written <S%G1125><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> that believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye may know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye may believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> confidence <S%G3954><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> in <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> that, <S%G3754><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> we ask <S%G154><s%> any thing <S%G5100><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his <S%G848><s%> will, <S%G2307><s%> he heareth <S%G191><s%> us: <S%G2257><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he hear <S%G191><s%> us, <S%G2257><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> we ask, <S%G154><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> petitions <S%G155><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> we desired <S%G154><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> his <S%G848><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> sin <S%G264><s%> a sin <S%G266><s%> which is not <S%G3361><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> he shall ask, <S%G154><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he shall give <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> for them that sin <S%G264><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> death. <S%G2288><s%> There is <S%G2076><s%> a sin <S%G266><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> death: <S%G2288><s%> I do not <S%G3756><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he shall pray <S%G2065><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> it. <S%G1565><s%>
All <S%G3956><s%> unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> sin: <S%G266><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> a sin <S%G266><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> death. <S%G2288><s%>

We know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> whosoever <S%G3956><s%> is born <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> sinneth <S%G264><s%> not; <S%G3756><s%> but <S%G235><s%> he that is begotten <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> keepeth <S%G5083><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that wicked one <S%G4190><s%> toucheth <S%G680><s%> him <S%G846><s%> not. <S%G3756><s%>

And we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> lieth <S%G2749><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> wickedness. <S%G4190><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is come, <S%G2240><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hath given <S%G1325><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> an understanding, <S%G1271><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we may know <S%G1097><s%> him that is true, <S%G228><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him that is true, <S%G228><s%> even in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G848><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> true <S%G228><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>
Little children, <S%G5040><s%> keep <S%G5442><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> from <S%G575><s%> idols. <S%G1497><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
